mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM board ORDER BY bno desc) WHERE rn >= (#{page} - 1) * 20 + 1 AND rownum <= #{page}*20
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE #{title} and rownum<=20 order by bno desc
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE CONTENT LIKE #{content} and rownum<=20 order by bno desc
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE WRITER LIKE #{writer} and rownum<=20 order by bno desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( bno, title, content, writer ) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
